title: ILoftFeatureData.IGetProfiles
description: Gets the profiles associated with this loft feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of profiles of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ILoftFeatureData::GetProfileCount
to get the size of Count.
Each profile returned is a
IFeature
object. A
ISketch
object can be extracted from this IFeature object by using
IFeature::GetSpecificFeature2
.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
